title: NHSRC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 03 Consultant Posts
description: The National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHSRC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Consultant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, and MD/MS can apply for the NHSRC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
